# beget_isp_licenses (Data Source)

List all available ISP Manager license types as a map keyed by plan identifier, optionally filtered by plan.

## Map Structure
- Key: plan identifier (e.g., `Host`)
- Value fields: `id`, `type`, `display_name`, `plan`, `primary`, `billing`, etc.

## Filtering
Set `plan` (e.g., `Host`) to return only licenses matching that plan. Omit the
attribute to list every available license type.

## Example Usage
```terraform
# Fetch all ISP Manager license types
data "beget_isp_licenses" "all" {}

output "license_plans" {
  value = keys(data.beget_isp_licenses.all.licenses)
}
```
```terraform
# Filter licenses by plan
data "beget_isp_licenses" "host" {
  plan = "Host"
}

locals {
  host_license = data.beget_isp_licenses.host.licenses["Host"]
}

output "host_license_details" {
  value = {
    id           = local.host_license.id
    type         = local.host_license.type
    display_name = local.host_license.display_name
    primary      = local.host_license.primary
  }
}
```
